entry.title: E6000 Fray Lock 2 ounce 565200C, Case/6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 23.77

E6000 Fray Lock, 2 ounce    565200

Case of 6 tubes

Fray Lock permanently seals raw edges and locks knots - even on buttons. It's ideal for quilting, embroidery, sewing and cross-stitching.

  • Works great on thread knots and frayed fabric
  • Dries crystal clear
  • Acid-Free
  • Washable
  • Permanent
  • Soft and Flexible

entry.title: E6000 Fabri-Tack 4 ounce 565104C. Case of 6 tubes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 24.40

E6000 Extreme Tack, 4 ounce

Case of 6 tubes  #565104C

Extreme Tack is a unique adhesive that allows you to make your own glue dots! It dries tacky for repositioning - ideal for mounting paper and lightweight materials to scrapbooks, walls, home décor items and more.

  • Stays permanently tacky!
  • Excellent on all types of fabric and just about any substrate
  • Make adhesive dots or lines of any size
  • Use over and over!
  • Dries clear
  • Acid-Free
  • Washable

entry.title: E6000 Craft Glue WHITE 2 oz #237040
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Adhesives, Glue
Price: 3.63

E6000® CRAFT Glue, BLACK,   2 ounce tube #237032

Our best selling Craft adhesive – E6000 Craft – is known for its exceptional strength, flexibility and toughness. Formulated to meet high-performance industrial requirements, it's versatile, flexible and adheres to most substrates. E6000 has exceptional adhesion to wood, metal, glass, fiberglass, ceramics, masonry and concrete. It also adheres strongly to leather, rubber, vinyl and many plastics. It will not break down or become brittle with temperature extremes. E6000 Bonds Everything So You Can Create Anything™. 

  • Extreme strength - forms a tough, permanent bond
  • Creates a flexible hold that won't crack, yellow or become brittle under stress
  • Indoor/Outdoor - withstands temperatures from -40 to 180 °F (10 to 32 °C)
  • Photo safe 
  • Dries clear/Paintable 
  • Washer/Dryer safe
  • Non-flammable once cured

entry.title: E6000® CRAFT Glue Clear Med Viscosity 3.7 oz tube Case/12 #230010C
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Glues, Adhesives
Price: 48.63

E6000® CRAFT Glue, CLEAR, Medium Viscosity, 3.7 ounce tube #230010C

CASE OF 12 TUBES 

E6000®  Glue was manufactured and sold as a high-performance industrial adhesive for over 25 years, E-6000® became a hit in the craft market with its superior performance, flexibility and versatility.

E6000® Dries Clear & Paintable, Washer/Dryer Safe, Photograph Safe, & Waterproof.

E6000® Self-Leveling Formula
An indispensable maintenance tool, E6000® allows the kind of permanent repair and maintenance of equipment that may have been too expensive or difficult in the past. E6000® provides adhesion strength and versatility not found in silicones and rubber cements. Its strength in adhering metals, glass, rubber and plastics makes it a universal vehicle maintenance and repair solution. Also, because it's self-leveling, E6000® may be used as potting material in electrical and computer applications.

entry.title: Jewelry and Bead CRAFT Glue 1 oz. 6 Per Case 242001C
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Adhesives, Glue
Price: 19.05

E6000 Jewelry & Bead

Each package contains one, 1 ounce tube of glue, plus 3 precision tips.  Case of 6 tubes.

E6000 Jewelry & Bead gives you the control you need for precise, no-mess applications. The applicator tips are perfect for permanently bonding stones, gems, beads and most types of jewelry metals. 

  • Includes four precision tips 
  • Easily bonds to polymer clay, metals, wood, leather and much more! 
  • Dries clear 
  • Maximum flexibility 
  • Waterproof – bond remains secure even when exposed to water
